name: gcdcloud
description: gcdcloud is a project that let you host your google drive with http server

PCLOUD_FOLDERID.description: the folder id that the config file will be stored into

GD_CLIENT_ID.description: the client id of your google drive api

GD_CLIENT_SECRET.description: the client secret of your google drive api

GD_SCOPE.description: the google drive scope that the OAuth will use
